Hello,

I'm a software engineer focused on web development with team leading experience. To me software is just a mean to get things moving.

Nowadays I am the Lead Back-end developer at Drivy, a startup creating the leading european peer to peer car rental website. Before that I worked both in France and the US for various startups, agencies or larger companies. Recently I released Liff, a quantified self app to track your day in a relevant way.

I also occasionally accept consulting and freelance work, give classes (at HEC, Learn Assembly, FACE and more), talk in meetups or contribute to open source.

If you want to meet up in Paris and have a chat, you can reach me via @marcgg on Twitter, my LinkedIn account or my email "marcg.gauthier-at-gmail-dot-com". You could also leave me your email and be kept up to date with some of the things I do.

Marc-
